title: Barbecue pavilion and picnic area, Elevator access, Onsite playground
neighborhood: 285 E Del Amo Blvd, Carson, CA
posting_body: ['Evolve South Bay is a place where we collaborate with our residents to redefine apartment living.', 'Our vibrant community, located in the heart of Carson, offers an exciting and engaging lifestyle with refined amenities in our new development apartment homes.', 'Each one of our pet friendly apartment homes come fully equipped with energy-efficient stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, private balconies, in-home washer and dryer, and much more.', '-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', '-Two-story resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen Photo Featured amenity', '-2-inch faux wood blinds', '-Private balcony or patio', '-Attached garages available select units', '-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area', '-Wood-style plank flooring Featured amenity', '-Close proximity to beaches, LAX, sporting venues, and restaurants', '-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi and private offices Featured amenity', '-State-of-the-art fitness center with running track and yoga room Featured amenity', '-Vaulted ceilings', '-Stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
